Package bits

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBitString  
    IBooleanLiteral
    The IBooleanLiteral interface must be implemented by any class definition of BooleanLiteral contemplated as an alternative to the BooleanLiteral class provided by this package.
    IBooleanVariable
    The IBooleanVariable interface must be implemented by any class definition of BooleanVariable contempleted as an alternative to the BooleanVariable class provided by this package.
    IClause
    The IClause interface must be implemented by any class definition of Clause contempleted as an alternative to the Clause class provided by this package.
    INaturalNumber  
    INumber
    Title: INumber interface
    IProblem
    The IProblem interface must be implemented by any class definition of Problem contempleted as an alternative to the Problem class provided by this package.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlternativeDenial
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the alternative denial (also called the NAND or Sheffer stroke) of several given IProblems.
    BitAnder
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitArraySingleSetter  
    BitEqualityIndicator
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitEqualizer
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
    BitExclusiveSelector
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitFixer
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Boolean constraint.
    BitInequalityIndicator
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitNander
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitNoter
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
    BitOrderer  
    BitOrer  
    BitShefferStroker
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
    BitUnequalizer  
    BitXnorer
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Boolean function.
    BitXorer
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Boolean function.
    BooleanLiteral
    A class which represents a Boolean literal.
    BooleanVariable  
    Clause
    A class which represents a satisfiability clause.
    ClauseDenier
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the denial of a given IClause.
    Conjunction  
    Disjunction
    Disjunction.java An extension of the Problem class which creates a new IProblem object from a collection of IProblem objects.
    EquivalenceRelation  
    ExclusiveDisjunction
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the exclusive disjunction of two given IProblems.
    FredkinGater
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Fredkin gate.
    KSatReader
    A reader which is created using an object of type positronic.satisfiability.elements.ISolver and has a method parseInstance which translates a positronic.satisfiability.elements.IProblem object into a corresponding org.sat4j.specs.IProblem object.
    Number
    Title: TBS
    Problem
    A class which represents a collection of IClause objects, and which amounts to a satisfiability problem.
    ProblemBitLinker
    This class links the value of an IBooleanVariable to the truth value of a given IProblem.
    ProblemDenier
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the denial of a given IProblem.
    ProblemDifferencer
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the logical difference of two given IProblems.
    ProblemPair  
    ThreeBitAdder
    An extension of the IProblem class which performs an add with carry of three BooleanVariables.
    ToffoliGater
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Toffoli gate.
    TwoBitAdder
    An extension of the IProblem class which performs an add with carry of two BooleanVariables.
